title: How to Change or Add a Profile Picture to Your Yelp Account

steps.headline: Go to the Yelp website.
steps.description: Type "www.yelp.com" into a web browser and press ↵ Enter. If your account is not logged in, click Log In in the upper-right corner of the window.

steps.headline: Click on your profile thumbnail icon from the upper-right corner of the any Yelp page, then click "Account Settings".
Click on the Add/Edit button to the right of the "Your Profile Picture" title topic.
steps.description: If you see your profile picture below, you've looked a little too far below. If you haven't already added it profile image, it will be a gray silhouette of a person.

steps.headline: Upload a new picture for your profile.
Select the picture you'd like to use and wait for the upload of these pictures to complete.
Click the "Set as Primary" button just slightly to the right of the image that was uploaded.
Edit the caption box.
steps.description: Click into the caption box, below the picture you just uploaded.

steps.headline: Type a caption (optional) that describes the picture.
steps.description: Try to describe where you were or summarize a memory of what was happening when the picture was taken.

steps.headline: Click the "Save caption" button located underneath the newly uploaded photo.
Open Yelp.
steps.description: It's a red app with the black and white word "yelp" in lowercase. If you are not logged in, tap Sign Up or Log In and follow the prompts to log in to your account.

steps.headline: Tap  ≡  that has the label "More" attached to it.
steps.description: It's located in either the lower-right corner of the screen (iPhone) or the top-left of the screen (Android).

steps.headline: Tap your username listing from the top of the screen.
Tap the triple dots button that is labelled "More About Me".
steps.description: If you don't have a profile photo already, you can omit this step entirely. This is where your profile will be and where your profile picture will be held until you change it.

steps.headline: Tap the gray Add Photo button that will get you to a place where another image can be added.
Choose from one of two ways to select an image to upload add/change.
steps.description: You have either the "Use My Facebook Photo" or the "Take/Choose Photo". Although most often people will select "Take/Choose Photo", if your Facebook profile picture isn't already set, you can tap "Use My Facebook Photo" and go onwards from there. Tap Use My Facebook Photo to use your current Facebook profile picture. Tap Take/Choose Photo to add a photo from your camera roll or take a new photo with your device's camera.

steps.headline: Select your photo you'd like to change/add and tap it.
Tap the "Next" button to begin the upload of the picture and wait for a moment for the photo to upload.
steps.description: The photo you chose is will become your Yelp profile picture. With the mobile app, you don't have to make the profile photo choice your new profile photo as a default photo - it's set already. If the spinning bar doesn't stop spinning after a minute or so, you may want to choose to take you back a page. Tap the "<Back" button to get it to go back. If you see your page change to your new profile photo, you've successfully changed your picture, and you may remove any old photos if you'd like. (Tap the photos one-by-one, tap the ... dots in the bottom right corner of the screen, then tap "Delete Photo"...on the confirmation screen, tap "OK" you'll be good as new. ).
